actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: To amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to permit States, with Federal matching under the program of emergency assistance to needy families with children, to purchase, construct, renovate, or rent facilities to provide emergency shelter for such families.
short_title: Emergency Aid to Homeless Families Act

summary.text: Emergency Aid to Homeless Families Act - Amends part A (Aid to Families with Dependent Children) of title IV of the Social Security Act to permit States to provide emergency assistance to needy families by purchasing, constructing, renovating, or renting emergency shelter for such families.

titles.title: Emergency Aid to Homeless Families Act

To amend part A of title IV of the Social Security Act to permit States, with Federal matching under the program of emergency assistance to needy families with children, to purchase, construct, renovate, or rent facilities to provide emergency shelter for such families.
